page.title: 01GENERAL DESCRIPTION
page.content: Situated on a narrow strip of land between sea and mountains; is our home town of Port Talbot. It is an industrial town, dominated by a vast steel works. Our area consists of two sections, within the town, called MARGAM and TAIBACH which are predominently taken up by the steel complex. These, together with BAGLAN,CWMAVON,BRYN, GOYTRE, ABERAVON,CYMMER and GLYNCORRWG form the Borough of Port Talbot. With the area of Aberavon containing a 3 mile long sandy beach. Running directly through the town is the old trunk road, the A48, which was a major transportation link before the new M4 motorway was created. Because of its docks and accessibility the town grew and seemed to crystalise around the trunk road.
